sections.heading: 01|Trustee duty to comply with act
sections.text: Effective:January 1, 2007Latest Legislation:House Bill 416 - 126th General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDF(A)(1) As used in the Revised Code, the "Ohio Uniform Prudent Investor Act" means sections5809.01to5809.08,5808.03,5808.05, and5808.06, division (A) of
